title: asnet4
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

asn.description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the netblock.

net4.description: The IPv4 address range assigned to the ASN.

net4:min.description: The first IPv4 in the range assigned to the ASN.

net4:max.description: The last IPv4 in the range assigned to the ASN.
